step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your arm straight overhead and feel that gentle resistance.
Excellent! Now, focus on keeping your arm extended as you prepare to make a fist.
Great job opening your hand wide. Remember to relax your muscles as you exhale.
Well done making a fist and tightening your muscles while inhaling. Visualize that lymph flow!
Second rep is going well. Continue to stretch your arm straight overhead and feel the resistance.
Good. Keep that arm extended and ready for the fist motion.
Nicely done opening your hand wide. Relax and exhale.
Fantastic! You're making a strong fist while inhaling. Keep up the great work visualizing the fluid movement.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm stretched overhead and focus on opening your hand wide while exhaling, then making a fist while inhaling. This helps promote lymph flow effectively.
